contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 1958 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Resurgam Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:25 p.m. May 21, 2011, 8:53 p.m. 1 Rockingham Band Edmund Hoole 2 383 Royal Artillery (TA) (Portsmouth) A. Davies 3 Templemore Alfie Bell 4 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth 5 Markham Main Colliery Band Haydn Griffiths 6 Agnes Street Band R. Ruddock Unknown Result 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Stuart Cairns Unknown Result Bestwood Welfare Black Diamonds Band T. Hinson Unknown Result Blackhall Colliery W. F. Buckley Unknown Result Bradford Victoria Tom Atkinson Unknown Result Eccles Borough Band Edward Buttress Unknown Result John Thompson Works Band Bram Gay Unknown Result BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Frederick Lonsdale Garth
